sentences.sContent: He took me out to the county fair to see the county sheriff, whose support Ron said we had to have to carry the county.
sentences.sContent_eng: He took me out to the county fair to see the county sheriff, whose support Ron said we had to have to carry the county.
sentences.sCn: 他带我到县里的集会上去见县治安官，他说如果我们要想在这个县里赢得选举，就一定得去见他。

words.tran: （郡司法长官，郡治安官，警察局长之）辖区；职务

trans.tranOther: an elected law officer of a  county  in the US
